name: The Haunted House
summary: Our heroine "Mikae Mitsu" lived in a house with his aunt after the death of her parents. Mikae was in the house when she woke up and saw the letter placed on her table. But she didn't care Because it was everywhere the water was going anywhere Mikae went to the bathroom. Enough to come back to the room, but suddenly, something unusual happened. Because of a sudden noise from behind her when she turned around, she discovered that a ghost had broken into the house, and Mikae hurried to hide, she began to feel anxious and afraid Then Mikae So find a way to get out of this house.
